questions.name: Is the casing free of cracks and damage?
questions.description: Please make sure that you inspect the device thoroughly.

questions.name: Are all covers and protective devices secure in place?
questions.description: Please ensure that all covers and protective devices are properly secured.

measurements.name: Protective Conductor Resistance
measurements.description: Measure insulation resistance between live parts and accessible conductive parts

questions.name: Does the device power on correctly?
questions.description: Please make sure that you plug in the device.
